name: Swords and Rings: Glory of the Shadow Lord
name_original: Swords and Rings: Glory of the Shadow Lord
description:
The Swords and Rings Game is a challenging, addicting game that will keep you busy for hours! Fun gameplay and different levels to choose from! Match the rings either vertically or horizontally!

Features:
* Great for Kids or Adults
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming
* Various Levels of Difficulty

Much more to come!
